description: Structures the response as a hierarchical outline with headings and subheadings. This decorator organizes information in a clear, logical structure that highlights relationships between main topics and subtopics.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Maximum nesting level of the outline

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Numbering or bullet style for the outline

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Whether to include brief explanations under each outline point

examples.description: Simple numeric outline of a complex topic
examples.usage:
+++Outline
Explain the structure of the United States government.
examples.result: Presents the US government structure as a numbered outline with up to 3 levels of hierarchy

examples.description: Detailed outline with mixed notation and deep hierarchy
examples.usage:
+++Outline(style=mixed, depth=5, detailed=true)
Provide a comprehensive overview of machine learning techniques.
examples.result: Creates a 5-level deep outline using mixed notation (numbers, letters, roman numerals) with brief explanations under each point, covering machine learning techniques
